Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: experimental
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} is likely to try everything once, enjoy surprises, and be more experienced.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: thoughtful
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people are diligent, punctual, and tend to plan ahead.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We need plans for the future.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need to address what's happening right now.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: extroverted
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people enjoy getting out, experiencing things, and being active.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: aggressive
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person is straightforward, blunt, and usually combative when they don't get what they want.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We need a leader who will stand up to our enemies.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need a leader who will make friends and allies.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: laid-back
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people don't get stressed out about things very easily and tend not to worry.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: You need a leader that can handle the stress.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: You need a leader that cares about performance.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: confident
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person has high self-assurance and self-esteem.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: empathetic
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person is able to put themselves into the shoes of others and understand their feelings.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: A leader should ensure that every colonist is taken care of.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: A leader shouldn't meddle in the private affairs of colonists.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: intelligent
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person possesses a lot of raw brain-power.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: judgmental
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person tends to form their opinions of people quickly and superficially, and is affected more by the actions of others.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Only good citizens deserve to be part of this colony.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: People in this colony come from all walks of life.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: spontaneous
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person tends to be impulsive and enjoy surprising others.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: As a leader, I'll get things done.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: As a leader, I'll tackle our problems carefully.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: upbeat
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people are happy, warm, and pleasant to be around.

conversationTopics.li: looking on the bright side of life

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: This colony is on the right track.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: This colony is headed for disaster.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: adventurous
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who is {0} feels more fulfilled when they try new things, expand their horizons, and go new places.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Everyone should have more opportunities.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Our colony has everything we need.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: ambitious
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} sets large, difficult goals for themselves and wants to be successful.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We need to dream big.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Let's ground ourselves in reality.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: compassionate
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people are concerned about other people's struggles and try to help them.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Any society is judged on the basis of how it treats its weakest members.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: A society is only as strong as its most capable members.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: creative
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people can imagine things in vivid detail, whether they ever existed or not.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: I'll bring innovative solutions to the table.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need to look at things as they are.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: cultured
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person is well-read, well-educated, and refined.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Those who do not learn history are doomed to repeat it.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: I'm just a regular person like all of you.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: emotional
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} has a lot of raw capacity for feeling emotion.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: independent
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person is perfectly happy being on their own and doesn't rely on others.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: This colony is burdened by takers.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We're stronger when we're united.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: logical
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person is highly capable of connecting cause and effect, and predicting the consequences of actions.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Our problems are solveable.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: I will solve our problems.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: optimistic
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who is {0} looks on the bright side of life.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Things are good, but they could be better.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Things are bad, but they could get worse.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: competitive
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: For a {0} person, it's not enough that they succeed, others must fail.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Our colony should reward innovators.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Everyone in our colony should be able to succeed.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: geeky
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who is {0} is intellectual, eccentric, and frequently socially awkward.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Think of the possibilities we can pursue.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Let's focus on what's practical.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: moralistic
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who is {0} adheres to traditional ideas of morality.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: It's our responsibility to do the right thing.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We can only do what's right for us.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: nostalgic
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} has a very strong connection to their past and anything that evokes those memories.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Things were better in the old days.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We can create a bright future.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: passionate
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: People who are {0} feel very strongly about things and tend to express themselves emphatically.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: I'll put all my energy into the job.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: I'll do what needs to be done.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: rational
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: The more {0} someone is, the more capable they are of thinking about things from a factual, objective standpoint.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We need a facts-based approach to the issues.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need to trust our instincts.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: generous
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: {0} people care less about having things and are more likely to give them to others.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Everyone should have access to the same things.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Everyone should earn what they have.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: naive
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} is guileless and often superstitious.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: My commitment to ideals would make me a good leader.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: My experience and know-how would make me a good leader.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: organized
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person keeps everything tidy, neat, and minimalistic.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We should focus more on cleaning and organizing.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We shouldn't burden ourselves with too many chores.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: outspoken
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: An {0} person has a lot of strong opinions and doesn't hesitate to share them.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We need greater support for free speech.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need to be more mindful of each other.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: pure
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: People who are {0} try to be chaste, traditional, and wholesome.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Traditional values are our values.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We need to advance as a people.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: trusting
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who is {0} tends to take people at their word and see the good in people.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: I will bring out the best in every colonist.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: I will stamp out the worst in every colonist.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: friendly
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} is kind, tolerant, and inviting to talk to.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We're all in this together.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We do what it takes to survive.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: polite
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person is well-mannered and makes an effort not to offend other people.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: We should respect those around us.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: We should be judged on our merits.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: romantic
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone {0} likes long-term, meaningful relationships, commitment, and intimate gestures.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: I will take the position seriously.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: This job won't go to my head.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: drug-friendly
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: A {0} person sees nothing wrong with drugs and makes no effort to avoid them.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Drugs can make our lives easier and better.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Drugs have no place in this colony.

Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.label: cool
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.description: Someone who's {0} is edgy, unique, and interesting, and people tend to like them more.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueHigh: Vote for the person you know and respect.
Psychology.PersonalityNodeDef.platformIssueLow: Vote for the person who will do the best job.
